metadata.title: CVE-2019-9243 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In wpa_supplicant_8, there is a possible out of bounds read due to amissing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure withno additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not neededfor exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID:A-120905706

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
